entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
